## Testing

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`go test -race ./...`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`golangci-lint run`)
- [ ] Markdown linting passes (`markdownlint-cli2 "**/*.md"`)

- [ ] Commits follow semantic commit format
